body_html:
That probably means argmax gradients would fail in 1.5. Bummer.

We need to fix this though. I'd love to understand why it fails, it looks like a bug in argmax itself, since using the dtype shouldn't break gradients. And we have to fix this soon, otherwise we'll have to patch 1.6.

body:
That probably means argmax gradients would fail in 1.5. Bummer. 

We need to fix this though. I'd love to understand why it fails, it looks like a bug in argmax itself, since using the dtype shouldn't break gradients. And we have to fix this soon, otherwise we'll have to patch 1.6.
